name: Allstate Insurance
description: A beige office promising protection from a world that's slowly falling apart. The Allstate Insurance office is a monument to the mundane, a beige-carpeted purgatory where dreams of security go to be filed away. Fluorescent lights hum overhead, casting a pallid glow on framed certificates and a perpetually wilting plastic plant. A friendly, yet vaguely unsettling, agent sits behind a desk, ready to discuss your premiums and the ever-present threat of unforeseen circumstances. The air smells faintly of stale coffee and the unspoken anxieties of a suburban populace trying to hold onto what little they have.
